title: [RANT] What a community...
body:
Join a ranked game, called top first.  Another guy calls top, but I said "I called first and I'm also picking before you, so I get top, sorry."  He insists that he should be top.  But whatever, this type of thing happens all the time.  I pick top, and then of course, the guy also picks top champ (again, AFTER I picked top champ).  Here's the kicker: You would think the rest of the team would chastise him, right? NOPE.  They come after me.  They're like "you idiot, why do we have two tops?"  

I calmly said "please just read the chat, I called it first and picked top first, please direct your frustration at him, blah, blah, blah, logic, logic, facts, facts"  Doesn't matter, it turns into a wolf pit and I'm the lamb.  The silver lining is that I at least knew my teammates were stupid/toxic.  So dodged it, and only wasted 4 minutes instead of 40 minutes.
